00041 class BulletShapePtr : public Ogre::SharedPtr<BulletShape>
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     BulletShapePtr() : Ogre::SharedPtr<BulletShape>() {}
00045     explicit BulletShapePtr(BulletShape *rep) : Ogre::SharedPtr<BulletShape>(rep) {}
00046     BulletShapePtr(const BulletShapePtr &r) : Ogre::SharedPtr<BulletShape>(r) {}
00047     BulletShapePtr(const Ogre::ResourcePtr &r) : Ogre::SharedPtr<BulletShape>()
00048     {
00049         if( r.isNull() )
00050             return;
00051         // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00052         OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00053             OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00054             pRep = static_cast<BulletShape*>(r.getPointer());
00055         pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00056         useFreeMethod = r.freeMethod();
00057         if (pUseCount)
00058         {
00059             ++(*pUseCount);
00060         }
00061     }
00062 
00064     BulletShapePtr& operator=(const Ogre::ResourcePtr& r)
00065     {
00066         if(pRep == static_cast<BulletShape*>(r.getPointer()))
00067             return *this;
00068         release();
00069         if( r.isNull() )
00070             return *this; // resource ptr is null, so the call to release above has done all we need to do.
00071         // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00072         OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00073             OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00074             pRep = static_cast<BulletShape*>(r.getPointer());
00075         pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00076         useFreeMethod = r.freeMethod();
00077         if (pUseCount)
00078         {
00079             ++(*pUseCount);
00080         }
00081         return *this;
00082     }
00083 };
